content.metaTitle: Villa Elysia - New Build 4 Bed Villa Jávea €1,285,000
content.metaDescription: Villa Elysia: Contemporary 4-bedroom villa on 1000m² plot in prestigious Cap Martí, Jávea. Private pool, modern design, €1,285,000. By Miralbo Urbana.
content.heroIntro:
Discover Villa Elysia, an exceptional new build villa that epitomizes contemporary Mediterranean luxury in one of Jávea's most coveted locations. Masterfully crafted by renowned developer Miralbo Urbana, this stunning 4-bedroom residence sits gracefully on a private 1,000m² plot in the prestigious Cap Martí - El Tossalet - Pinomar area, where exclusivity meets natural beauty.

Inspired by Ibiza's architectural elegance with a distinctly modern twist, Villa Elysia seamlessly blends pure lines with noble materials to create a harmonious sanctuary that celebrates both indoor-outdoor living and the magnificent Costa Blanca lifestyle. Every detail has been meticulously planned to maximize natural light, spaciousness, and comfort, while the surrounding native Mediterranean vegetation creates an authentic connection with the coastal environment that makes Jávea so extraordinary.

locationSection.intro:
Cap Martí represents the pinnacle of residential luxury in Jávea, offering an enviable position between the dramatic Montgó Natural Park and the sparkling Mediterranean Sea. This exclusive enclave within the El Tossalet - Pinomar area is renowned for its tranquil atmosphere, prestigious properties, and stunning natural surroundings, making it one of the most sought-after addresses on the entire Costa Blanca.

The location provides the perfect balance of privacy and convenience, with Jávea's charming old town, pristine beaches, and world-class amenities just minutes away. From the famous Arenal Beach to the picturesque port area, residents enjoy easy access to exceptional restaurants, boutique shopping, international schools, and championship golf courses, all while being surrounded by the breathtaking landscapes that have made Jávea a magnet for discerning international buyers.
highlights: Exclusive Cap Martí location with prestigious neighboring properties
Minutes from Jávea's beautiful Arenal Beach and crystal-clear coves
Close proximity to Montgó Natural Park for hiking and nature activities
Easy access to international schools and healthcare facilities
Short drive to Denia ferry port connecting to Ibiza and Mallorca

propertyFeatures.intro: Villa Elysia showcases contemporary architecture at its finest, with every element designed to enhance the Mediterranean lifestyle. The 162m² of thoughtfully planned living space flows seamlessly across generous terraces and outdoor areas, creating an expansive feel that maximizes both the plot's potential and the stunning natural surroundings.
features: 4 spacious bedrooms with abundant natural light
3 full bathrooms with modern fixtures and finishes
Open-plan living areas with floor-to-ceiling windows
Private swimming pool with sun terraces
Covered wooden pergola creating charming outdoor dining area
Covered carport for two vehicles with concrete access
1,000m² private plot with mature Mediterranean landscaping
Contemporary Ibiza-inspired architecture with clean lines
Multiple outdoor terraces for year-round entertaining

content.investmentSection:
Jávea continues to demonstrate exceptional resilience and growth in the luxury property market, with new build villas in prime locations like Cap Martí showing consistent appreciation. The combination of limited land availability, strict building regulations, and increasing international demand creates a perfect storm for long-term capital growth, making Villa Elysia an outstanding investment opportunity for discerning buyers.

The rental market in Jávea is equally impressive, with luxury villas commanding premium rates from affluent holidaymakers seeking exclusive accommodations. Properties of Villa Elysia's caliber typically achieve annual rental yields of 5-7%, with the potential for even higher returns during peak summer months. The villa's contemporary design, private pool, and prestigious location make it ideally positioned to capitalize on Jávea's thriving luxury tourism market while providing a magnificent personal retreat.
whyBuySection: Exclusive new build villa by respected developer Miralbo Urbana with proven track record
Prime Cap Martí location offering privacy, prestige, and proximity to amenities
Contemporary design maximizing indoor-outdoor living perfect for Mediterranean climate
Generous 1,000m² plot providing exceptional privacy and garden space
Strong investment potential in Jávea's consistently appreciating luxury market
Turn-key property ready for immediate enjoyment with no renovation required
Excellent rental potential in one of Costa Blanca's most desirable destinations

faqs.question: What is the total price for Villa Elysia and what payment terms are available?
faqs.answer: Villa Elysia is priced at €1,285,000. We can arrange flexible payment schedules and work with you to structure the purchase according to your needs. Our team can also connect you with mortgage specialists who understand international buyers' requirements.

faqs.question: Why is the Cap Martí area considered so desirable in Jávea?
faqs.answer: Cap Martí is one of Jávea's most prestigious locations, offering exclusivity, privacy, and proximity to both natural beauty and amenities. The area features high-end properties, excellent security, and is just minutes from beaches, restaurants, and international schools while maintaining a peaceful, residential atmosphere.

faqs.question: Can international buyers easily purchase Villa Elysia?
faqs.answer: Absolutely. Spain welcomes international property investment, and our experienced team guides buyers through every step of the purchase process. We work with trusted legal professionals and can recommend mortgage brokers who specialize in helping international clients secure Spanish property financing.

faqs.question: Are mortgages available for this property?
faqs.answer: Yes, mortgages are available for international buyers, typically up to 70% of the property value. We work with Habeno and other specialist mortgage brokers who can secure competitive rates and terms for Villa Elysia purchasers.

faqs.question: What rental income potential does Villa Elysia offer?
faqs.answer: Luxury villas in Jávea's prime locations typically achieve annual rental yields of 5-7%. Villa Elysia's contemporary design, private pool, and prestigious Cap Martí location make it highly attractive to affluent holidaymakers, potentially generating excellent rental returns.

faqs.question: When will Villa Elysia be completed and ready for occupation?
faqs.answer: As a new build project by Miralbo Urbana, Villa Elysia is designed to be completed to the highest standards. For specific completion timelines and availability, please contact our team directly for the most current project status and handover schedule.

faqs.question: What is included in the purchase price of Villa Elysia?
faqs.answer: The purchase includes the fully finished 4-bedroom villa, private swimming pool, landscaped gardens, covered carport for two vehicles, all fitted kitchens and bathrooms, and the complete 1,000m² plot. Our team can provide a detailed specification list of all inclusions.

faqs.question: How can I arrange a viewing of Villa Elysia?
faqs.answer: We'd be delighted to arrange a private viewing of Villa Elysia. Contact us via WhatsApp, phone, or through our website to schedule an appointment. We can also arrange virtual tours for international clients who cannot visit immediately.

faqs.question: What makes Miralbo Urbana a trusted developer?
faqs.answer: Miralbo Urbana S.L. is an established developer known for delivering high-quality properties that combine contemporary design with traditional Mediterranean values. Their attention to detail, use of premium materials, and commitment to customer satisfaction make them a preferred choice for luxury developments in the Costa Blanca region.

content.conclusion: Villa Elysia represents a rare opportunity to own a stunning new build villa in one of Jávea's most exclusive locations. With its contemporary design, generous plot, and exceptional investment potential, this property offers the perfect blend of luxury living and financial opportunity. Don't miss your chance to secure this magnificent Mediterranean sanctuary - contact our team today to arrange your private viewing and take the first step toward owning your dream villa in paradise.
